main.bio: I am a tinkerer am a software engineer that loves to learn and improve. My passion is to create software that solves problems and helps people.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here are the skills that I've used in work and in projects

education.degree: Bachelors of Science in Electrical Engineering

work.title: Software Integration Test Engineer
work.description: I integrate, test, and debug inflight entertainment systems. Most of the entertainment systems that you see on airplanes is owned by PAC. I have learned a lot about how systems work together and communicate with one another and have improved my skills at troubleshooting and testing.

work.title: Engineering Intern
work.description: At Broadcom, I tested many different Broadcom Ethernet products using oscilloscopes and network analyzers. I began my career of testing and was challenged to question how and why anything worked.

projects.title: Budgetting Application
projects.description: Application to categorize transactions when their posted using Plaid API

projects.title: Pizza Website
projects.description: Allows users to order pizza and for admins to update menu utilizing Django Admin system

projects.title: Chat Application
projects.description: Single page application that allows users to talk to others in a channel utilizing Flask Sockets

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
